Articles.Content:
Happy spacewalk day... yes I just made that up.

Anyway today is the anniversary of the first spacewalk. Ad astra!

![700x500_xxx_s6250073-alexei_leonov_first_space_walk_1965-spl-lr_1.jpg](http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/special/2014/newsspec_9035/media/700x500_xxx_s6250073-alexei_leonov_first_space_walk_1965-spl-lr_1.jpg)

congratulations, has to think of it then kerbals is ejected from mk1 pod.

Yes the first spacewalk also had it issues.
Leonov? Whatever his name is, I say we name this day after him.
